general_advisory: Sow wheat and rice early to maximize yield. Monitor maize for any signs of pests.

advisory: Apply nitrogen-based fertilizer in the early growth stages.
Irrigate the field consistently to maintain soil moisture.
Transplant rice seedlings in well-prepared wet fields.
Control weeds regularly to prevent competition for nutrients and water.
Watch out for common maize pests such as armyworms and fall armyworms.
Ensure proper spacing between plants for optimal growth.
